classical_energies(file)

Return the classical energies in Hartrees

diff_bonds(file1, file2[, file])

This function returns the bonds that are in one file (first argument) but not in the other (second argument).

distance(file, index1, index2)

This code checks the distances between two atoms in the last configuration of a trajectory file (e.g. *.log file from gaussian).

dof_classificator(dofs_indexes, ...)

return all degrees of freedom defined by atoms of the same residue

dof_classificator2(dofs_indexes, ...)

Return all degrees of freedom that includes at least one atom of a residue
